About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I have been a professional programmer in one sense or another since I graduated from Rice University in 1980. My undergraduate degree was a BS in Electrical Engineering, and I fully intended to design hardware, but the work that I gravitated to involved programming embedded microprocessors.
